rajma.name: Rajma
rajma.title: Fastest Draw in the Outer Rim
rajma.description: A flirtatious, dangerously skilled gunslinger whose speed, precision, and charisma are legendary across the Outer Rim.
rajma.philosophy: Speed decides everything. Hesitation gets you killed.
rajma.emphasis: Quick-draw mastery, precision shooting, confidence, reputation
rajma.voiceStyle: Playful, flirtatious, cocky. Never takes a fight—or a conversation—too seriously.
rajma.tooltip: Rajma reflects your character through speed, style, and lethal confidence

levelGreetings.1: So you wanna learn the quick-draw, gorgeous? First lesson: it’s not who shoots first—it’s who hits first.
levelGreetings.2: Your draw’s getting faster. Almost as fast as my heart when you walk in. Almost.
levelGreetings.3: That form? Smooth. That aim? Deadly. You’re starting to look dangerous. I like dangerous.
levelGreetings.4: Outdrawing soldiers already? Impressive. Drinks after practice? Worth asking.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway there. Folks are avoiding duels with you now. Smart. I wouldn’t avoid you though.
levelGreetings.6: Your hands move like lightning. Hypnotic, really. Totally professional observation.
levelGreetings.7: Did you just shoot that credit chip midair? Show-off. Confidence looks good on you.
levelGreetings.8: Enemies drop before they know what happened. Me? I knew the moment I met you.
levelGreetings.9: Almost the fastest gun in the galaxy. Second fastest. I’m still number one—technically.
levelGreetings.10: Master gunslinger. Fastest draw I’ve trained. Drinks still on the table, by the way.

gunslinger_quickdraw.confirmation: Reflex and timing must become instinct.

gunslinger_sharpshooter.greeting: Sharpshooter. One perfect shot beats ten rushed ones.
gunslinger_sharpshooter.confirmation: Patience and accuracy end fights early.

gunslinger_desperado.confirmation: Audacity pays—if skill backs it up.

gunslinger_legend.greeting: Legendary. Enemies hesitate when they see you.

gunslinger_master.confirmation: Every draw and shot must be flawless.

guidance.class: Choose what makes you faster and deadlier.
guidance.multiclass: Other skills won’t help if you lose the draw.
guidance.hp: Even fast guns take hits sometimes.
guidance.summary: Draw fast. Shoot straight. Live stylishly.

tier1: The galaxy runs on smiles, favors, and knowing when to leave.
tier2: Love’s the fastest way to miss a hyperspace jump.
tier3: Chasing the past makes you lose the present.
tier4: I’ve got a daughter who deserves better stories.
